thread.title: Huawei's P10, P10 Plus flagships make stylish Malaysian entrance
thread.title_full: Huawei's P10, P10 Plus flagships make stylish Malaysian entrance

author: Erna Mahyuni
title: Huawei's P10, P10 Plus flagships make stylish Malaysian entrance
text: Huawei's P10, P10 Plus flagships make stylish Malaysian entrance Huawei is also bringing in the Huawei P10 Lite variant to the country 09 March 2017 / 10:54MYT Fresh off being announced at the recent Mobile World Congress, the Huawei P10 line is now officially available in the country. From budget to flagship Embedded video The highest-end model the P10 Plus runs on Kirin's 960 processor, and a generous 6GB of RAM as well as 128GB of storage as well as a 5.5in Quad HD display. As for the P10, it has a 5.1in Full HD display, with less RAM and storage (4GB and 64GB). As for the cameras, the P10 Plus has a 20MP (monochrome) + 12MP (RGB) back camera combol with OIS and an 8MP f/1.9 front camera. The P10 Plus has the same setup but uses an older camera, as in the ones on last year's P9 and Mate 9 series. Battery-wise, the P10 Plus has a 3750mAh battery while the P10's is a smaller 3200mAh. Right now the phones come in Graphite Black and Prestige Gold colour options, with more to perhaps come in future. Pricing: the P10 Plus is retailing for RM3099, the P10 for RM2499 and the P10 Lite for RM1299. Preorders will open 23 March 2017, with open sales beginning 31 March. Liked that? Read this...
